altername_name: Meng Huan Shui Guo Pan: 777 Casino
name: Meng Huan Shui Guo Pan: 777 Casino
overview: Meng Huan Shui Guo Pan: 777 Casino is an unlicensed Taiwanese Sega Mega Drive game published by City Man Technology Co., Ltd. The game is a casino-type game, where you play as either a boy or a girl walking around a town full of gambling buildings. To play a game, walk to the back of the building and talk to the bunny girl, who will give you tokens to play. Known games included are slots, a Taiwanese redemption game called Xiao Mali, and blackjack.
